content.icerik: Face Lifting Fluid This excellent beauty-booster for the age group 35+ promotes immediate and long lasting radiance.Enriched with nourishing and hydrating vegetal extracts, Face Lifting Fluid restores the moisture balace of the skin, while providing a firming effect. It helps to minimize fine lines and wrinkles, smoothes, softens the skin. Face Lifting Fluid is particularly suitable for sensetive skins.It is recommended to use this light emulsion 3 times a week in the first month and twice a week in the following months.
